tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (
  instrument_id INT,
  repair_date DATE,
  repair_details TEXT,
  technician_name VARCHAR(50),
  repair_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
CREATE TABLE InstrumentRepair ( repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY, instrument_id INT, repair_date DATE, repair_type VARCHAR(50), repair_details TEXT );
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceHistory ( maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, instrument_id INT, maintenance_date DATE, maintenance_type VARCHAR(50), maintenance_details TEXT );

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_History (
    repair_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    repair_date DATE NOT NULL,
    repair_description TEXT,
    repair_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Instruments (
    instrument_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    instrument_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE NOT NULL,
    purchase_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Technicians (
    technician_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    technician_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    technician_specialty VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Repairs (
    repair_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_id INT REFERENCES Instruments(instrument_id),
    technician_id INT REFERENCES Technicians(technician_id),
    repair_date DATE NOT NULL,
    repair_description TEXT,
    repair_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_id UUID NOT NULL,
  repair_date DATE NOT NULL,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  repair_description TEXT
);
